statements: SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_status='active';

SELECT email FROM students WHERE name='Alice';
SELECT name, email, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE enrollment_status='pending';
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'inactive' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT DISTINCT enrollment_status FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_status DESC;
SELECT name, email, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'pending' OR enrollment_status = 'approved' ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status = 'active';

SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 5;

SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status = 'Enrolled' AND id = 3;

SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'ENROLLED';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, name, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE enrollment_status IN ('ENROLLED', 'PENDING') ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status='Active';
SELECT course_name, enrollment_status FROM Courses JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE course_id=101;
SELECT * FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE enrollment_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY enrollment_date;
SELECT DISTINCT course_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM Courses INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 3;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY name;
SELECT course_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM Courses INNER JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING AVG(grade) > 3.5;

SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_status='active';
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses ORDER BY department;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM teachers WHERE department='Mathematics';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'active';
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'inactive';
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses WHERE department = 'Mathematics';
SELECT s.name, c.course_name, e.enrollment_date FROM students s INNER JOIN enrollments e ON s.id = e.student_id INNER JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT t.teacher_name, g.grade FROM teachers t INNER JOIN enrollments e ON t.department = 'Science' AND t.teacher_id = e.course_id INNER JOIN grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id;
